import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; // Images import logo from "../assets/logo.jpg"; import hero from "../assets/hero.jpg"; import bridalImg from "../assets/bridal1.jpg"; import everydayImg from "../assets/everyday1.jpg"; import luxuryImg from "../assets/luxury1.jpg"; const Home = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); // MongoDB se products fetch karna useEffect(() => { fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/products") .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setProducts(data)) .catch((err) => console.error("Error fetching products:", err)); }, []); return (
{/* Navbar */}
Elegant Jewelry
  • Home
  • About
  • Collections
  • Orders
  • Wishlist
  • Contact
{/* Hero Section */}
{/* Hero Panel */}

Elegant Jewelry

Where timeless elegance meets modern design ✨

Discover our handpicked jewelry crafted for every occasion ✨

{/* Our Collections */}

Our Collections

Bridal Collection

Stunning jewelry for your special day — earrings, necklaces, rings, bracelets.

Everyday Collection

Stylish and versatile pieces perfect for daily wear — lightweight, elegant, and timeless.

Luxury Collection

Exclusive and opulent jewelry for special occasions — crafted with premium materials and intricate designs.

{/* ✨ New Arrivals Section (Same Design, Separate) */}

New Arrivals

{products.length === 0 ? (

Loading latest jewelry...

) : ( products.map((item) => (

{item.name}

Elegant handcrafted jewelry piece with premium finish.

₹{item.price}

)) )}
{/* Footer */}

© 2025 Elegant Jewelry. All Rights Reserved.

); }; export default Home;
